name: Globetrotters
description:
Travel from planet to planet with your jet pack. Globetrotters is a four-player party-game for the whole family.
The rules are simple: Collect more diamonds than the other three astronauts.
Enjoy this free gift from Broken Rules.
FEATURES
- Simple fun for the whole family!
- Drop-in drop-out multiplayer!
- Planet-hopping with gravity fields!
- Exploding stellar objects!
BACKGROUND
Globetrotters was originally produced in a 48 hour game jam. The iPad port took about a week. We had great fun developing it, since it gave us a break from crunching on And Yet It Moves.
WHO WE ARE
Globetrotters was developed by Broken Rules, a small independent games company from Vienna, Austria. We're the makers of And Yet It Moves, available in the Mac App Store.
